attributes.action: Ensure that increases in MP's and ministers salaries ,allowances and perquisites do not exceed those paid to other public service employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government is seen to give itself very generous remuneration increases that they feel are justified.Public service workers do not get the same consideration.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
